item.title: ...(PI) Cachedownloading, REP++ FOR HELP
item.dc:creator: @Agent_Jugz Agent Jugz
item.description:
@Agent_Jugz wrote:

I really don’t understand this. I downloaded lostlegacy cache, put new hitsplats in (they load correctly etc) I make the cache .zip re-upload to dropbox.com, put the url in cachedownloader.java compile re-run the client and I get this error;

I know what the errors telling me, it’s just I move all the files back into the main folder and it fixes, then I re-upload to do the same etc, downloads cache and the same error.

Read full topic
